sentences.en: A collection of valuable items discovered or found; a treasure - trove.
sentences.cn: 珍藏物,(贵重的)发现物被发现或找到的一批有价值的东西; 地财.

sentences.en: A vast treasure-trove of virtually unheard melody awaits discovery by this new audience.
sentences.cn: 大量不为人知的优美旋律正等着这批新听众来发掘。

sentences.en: But at the stern of the ship, divers found a trove of gold and silver and high-grade ceramics whose significance is more mysterious.
sentences.cn: 但是潜水人员在船尾部发现了一个由金、银以及高级陶瓷打造的收藏品，这件收藏品的意义更加神秘。

sentences.en: Cucumber, chilli, aubergine - this is a real vegetable treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 黄瓜, 辣椒, 茄子,简直就是地三鲜了.

sentences.en: He assembled a rich trove of Chinese porcelain.
sentences.cn: 他收集了一批中国瓷器.

sentences.en: He made another discovery of treasure - trove in the library.
sentences.cn: 在莱利家仓库搞拳击的人则因他的缺席而高兴.

sentences.en: Mr. Lei recalls the two moment trying to resell their virtual trove.
sentences.cn: 雷磊回想起两个人没日没夜地试图转卖他们窃取的虚拟财产.

sentences.en: She made another discovery of a treasure - trove in the library.
sentences.cn: 她在藏书室里又发现了一件宝物.

sentences.en: The center housed a priceless treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 该中心存放着一件无价之宝.

sentences.en: The dictionary is a vast treasure trove of information.
sentences.cn: 那本词典是个巨大的信息宝库。

sentences.en: The gallery is a treasure trove of medieval art.
sentences.cn: 这个画廊是中世纪艺术的宝库.

sentences.en: The Semantic Web would also be a bottomless trove of eureka insights.
sentences.cn: 语义万维网也会是新发现的无底宝库.

sentences.en: The society's archives are a treasure trove for scholars.
sentences.cn: 该协会的档案对学者来说简直是宝藏。

sentences.en: These can be a treasure trove for this type of information.
sentences.cn: 一旦这样做,你可以选择类型的记录,您有兴趣寻找.

sentences.en: This Islington shop is a treasure trove of beautiful bridalwear.
sentences.cn: 这家位于伊斯灵顿区的商店里汇聚了各种漂亮的新娘服装。

sentences.en: Windsor Castle is quite literally an antique treasure trove.
sentences.cn: 温莎城堡确实是名副其实的古物宝藏。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 无主珍宝，无主埋藏物

trans.tran_cn: （物主不明的）发掘出来的金银财宝
